name: Tommy Hilfiger American Dream Collection
description: Tommy Hilfiger's American Dream Collection is crafted with cotton & features a statement-making landscape of stars & stripes, for a bold, patriotic look

name: Hotel Collection Modern Woven Pleats Bedding Collection
description: Rows of tailored pleats embellish pure cotton for a clean, polished appeal. Mix and match quilted accessories, decorative pillows and luxurious sheeting for a look of high style and indulgent comfort.
